stimulusHtml: Malagan displays like the one shown, containing elaborately carved and painted figures, poles, and friezes, were usually intended to

features.html: The question refers to the two images shown.

choicesHtml: be used as a stage for a new king during royal coronation ceremonies
serve as a ceremonial space for the reception of foreign dignitaries
serve as a temporary altar space during an annual harvest ritual
be revealed at the height of commemorative ceremonies honoring the dead
